about.title: About WILLIAMIKANDA GROUP
about.content: WILLIAMIKANDA GROUP is a development organization founded on December 25, 2014, by its founding President, Mr. William Mikanda, and his close associates, such as Mrs. Diana Panga, later joined by Naomi Ngoy and others. Mr. WILLIAM MIKANDA, the eldest son of Mikanda Fredy and Tshilumba Joséphina, is a devout Christian. Born on May 20, 1997, in Kinshasa, he traveled to Turkey, Portugal, Belgium, Uzbekistan, Russia, India, and the United Arab Emirates to pursue his professional football career. The Group operates primarily in football—professional club, academy, and management—and also in catering, transportation, the sale of sports equipment (EL MASKO9), and support for widows and orphans globally through the WILLIAMIKANDA FAMILY.
about.whoContent: We are a family-led organization blending sports excellence with social impact. Our mission is to discover talent, develop character, and deliver opportunities on and off the pitch.
